entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
